description: A remark plugin to render Hexo's tag plugins
name: remark-hexo

scripts.check: npm run check:format -- --list-different && npm run check:lint
scripts.fix: npm run fix:format && npm run fix:lint
scripts.log: git add . && git commit -am "chore: created clean Git working directory"
scripts.postversion: git push origin && git push origin --tags && npm publish --access public
scripts.preversion: git checkout main && git pull && npm run && npm run test && npm run dist
scripts.release:major: generate-changelog -M -x "chore,test" && npm run log && npm version major
scripts.release:minor: generate-changelog -m -x "chore,test" && npm run log && npm version minor
scripts.release:patch: generate-changelog -p -x "chore,test" && npm run log && npm version patch
scripts.test: npm run test:types && npm run test:unit:coverage
